Tap here to get started!: Khumbha laha ku lava ku sungula!
You can choose whether you want to add i: U nga hlawula ku ri u lava ku engetela malunghena kumbe malihuma eka xitatimende xa wena xa malinghena
Let's go through one example! Tap income: A hi endli swikombiso! Khumbha malinghena
See a list of income types. For income t: Vona longoloko wa tinxaka ta malinghena. Eka malinghena leyi nga riki kona eka longoloko lowu, u nga hlawula 'Other'
Let's pretend you received a donation to: A hi endleni onge hi amukerile minyikelo namutlha, khumbha laha!
You will need to fill in all the info on: Swi ta laveka leswaku u tata vuxokoxoko eka xikirini
I've filled in an example for you! Now t: Ndzi tatile ku ku kombisa xikombiso! Sweswo khumbha 'Save'
Great! Your income has now been added to: Swikahle! Malinghena ya wena sweswi yi engeteleriwile eka nkomiso wa xitatimende xa malinghena eka thebe ya mali
You can see, change, or download you sta: U nga vona, cinca, kumbe kuma switatimende hi ku khumbha tihatheni.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Swikahle! Muholo wa wena wu hoxiwile eka nkomiso wa xitatimende xa muholo eka thebe ya mali
